description: A range data element is a data element that defines a range with min and max.
comment: According Platform Industrie 4.0. Details of Asset Administration Shell (Version 3.0) Part 1 Release Candidate 02

contents.name: valueType
contents.description: Data type of the min und max

contents.name: min
contents.description: The minimum value of the range

contents.name: max
contents.description: The maximum value of the range
